title: Global Cannabis Data Sets Now Accessible Via Single Central Repository
text:
New Frontier Data Launches First Cannabis Data Marketplace

WASHINGTON — New Frontier Data, the authority in data, analytics and business intelligence for the global cannabis industry, launches the first global and digital cannabis data marketplace on its online platform Equio™. Industry researchers, business owners and firms interested in doing their own research on the cannabis industry can now download thousands of data sets easily accessible via one single platform. New Frontier Data is opening its library of vetted cannabis industry data to continue to foster transparency across the industry as well as support more complex and advanced research and analysis. This new Equio™ feature provides access to both individual and bundled data sets ranging from cannabis consumer trends to global market figures and hemp-focused market data.

“New Frontier Data was the first firm to identify and address the need for data in what is now a global cannabis market. We have spent over five years building the only cannabis Big Data technology platform that is able to ingest, scrub, process and report millions of data points. Our industry reporting has now reached over 80 nations worldwide, and so the time has come to support others’ research and reporting by leveraging what is ultimately our core competency: data reporting,” noted Giadha Aguirre de Carcer, New Frontier Data Founder and CEO. “New Frontier Data’s ultimate vision is to be the global nexus of cannabis market data, becoming the most trusted partner for those seeking to better understand or navigate the global cannabis space.”

Designed to equip cannabis market stakeholders with the tools needed to make educated business decisions based on vetted data, New Frontier Data’s Equio platform now offers three access and subscription levels:

Essential – Designed for savvy early entrants and operating executives who need to make educated decisions and gain easy access to timely, actionable intelligence.

Premium – Best suited for researchers, analysts and attorneys who need to monetize their own research and repurpose New Frontier Data analyses.

Enterprise – The most comprehensive and cost-effective multi-user access, designed for larger enterprises looking into the cannabis industry.

All subscription levels have access to the data marketplace. Become an Equio subscriber today here.

About New Frontier Data:

New Frontier Data is an independent, technology-driven analytics company specializing in the cannabis industry. It offers vetted data, actionable business intelligence and risk management solutions for investors, operators, researchers and policy makers. New Frontier Data’s reports and data have been cited in over 80 countries around the world to inform industry leaders. Founded in 2014, New Frontier Data is headquartered in Washington, D.C., with additional offices in Denver, CO, and London, UK.

New Frontier Data does not take a position on the merits of cannabis legalization. Rather, its mission and mandate are to inform cannabis-related policy and business decisions through rigorous, issue-neutral and comprehensive analysis of the legal cannabis industry worldwide. For more information about New Frontier Data, please visit: https://www.NewFrontierData.com.
